extraction_text: Safety Bulletin: Platform Edge Door Inspection (DOC001) Type: Safety Bulletin Source: Commissioner of Metro Rail Safety (email) Received: 2025-09-01 Deadline: 2025-09-10 Responsible: Station Engineer Priority: High Summary: Mandatory platform edge door inspection across all stations. Report findings and corrective actions within 9 days. Alerts: - Deadline approaching: 2025-09-10 - High risk: passenger safety Traceability: Original source attached. Click 'View Source' in the UI to open the origin

metadata.document_title: Safety Bulletin: Platform Edge Door Inspection (DOC001)
metadata.job_to_do: Conduct a mandatory inspection of all platform edge doors and report findings and corrective actions by the deadline.
